channel.title: How to change an NPC's Health?
channel.description:
1. How do I change an NPC's health?
2. Also How do I make an NPC attack with mage/range and hit HIGH, Like as a boss/jad.
I am sorta a newbie at this xd. So pleaseee dont yell at me.

item.title: How to change an NPC's Health?
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“GangstaNerd, post:5, topic:277918”] newNPC.HP = HP; newNPC.MaxHP = HP; newNPC.MaxHit = (int)Math.floor((HP / 5000)); if (newNPC.MaxHit < 1) { newNPC.MaxHit = 1;

So if i want max hp to be 5000, thats how it would go?[/quote]I think you’ve got it

item.title: How to change an NPC's Health?
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“GangstaNerd, post:3, topic:277918”]I have tried several times and looked in there , could I be close here?

else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3494) {//Barrelchest Thing hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30);

misc.random is how much it hits, How do I change its hp?[/quote]something like this newNPC.absX = x; newNPC.absY = y; newNPC.makeX = x; newNPC.makeY = y; newNPC.moverangeX1 = rangex1; newNPC.moverangeY1 = rangey1; newNPC.moverangeX2 = rangex2; newNPC.moverangeY2 = rangey2; newNPC.walkingType = WalkingType; newNPC.HP = HP; newNPC.MaxHP = HP; newNPC.MaxHit = (int) Math.floor((HP / 100)); <----- if (newNPC.MaxHit < 1) { newNPC.MaxHit = 1;

Read full topic

misc.random is how much it hits, How do I change its hp?
